name: U-Night Fury
description:
U-Night Fury

GMTK Game Jam 2021

  • Mouse = Move Drone
  • A / D = Move Speeder
  • Left Click = Split

In U-Night Fury you have to be ambidextrous to control both racers and complete the course with the highest score. To complete all obstacles you have to combine and release at the right time. Timing is everything, get the fastest time and collect all rings to get the highscore! 

Credits:

  • Arend-Jan Krooneman
  • Liviu Paicu
  • Thomas Meutgeert
  • Firat Isik

@Hok
